title: The Scriptwriter
description: The Scriptwriter is a politico-military thriller set in Pakistan amidst political turmoil in the second half of 2014. Novel's theme is based on the international espionage net that covers South Asian and Middle Eastern region. Caught in this net is the elected Government of Pakistan which is accused by the opposition of having come in power via fraudulent elections. The plot is centred upon the US preparations for attack on the Islamic State of Iraq and Levant/Syria and its involvement in Pakistani politics and regime change.
author: Adeerus Ghayan
